input: What’s the due date for ITR-3 filing in FY 2025-26?
output: For FY 2025-26 (AY 2026-27), the due date for filing ITR-3 (for individuals/HUFs with business/profession income) is September 15, 2026, for non-audit cases. For audit cases, it’s October 31, 2026. Late filing incurs a penalty of ₹5,000 (₹1,000 if income < ₹5 lakh) plus 1% interest per month under Section 234A.
